entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
